languages.text: {n}Идира расплывается в ухмылке.{/n} "Ну, это должно быть что-то, чем можно тыкать каждому встречному в нос со словами "Смотри, как Вольный Торговец любит меня". Например, роскошное платье, каких нет даже у аристократок Даргонуса. Наша "принцесса контрабандистов" будет в восторге от возможности утереть дворянству носы своими привилегиями".

{n}Idira's face breaks into a crooked smile.{/n} "Well, it would have to be something that screams 'Look how much the Rogue Trader loves me' in the faces of everyone she meets. Like a fabulous gown beyond anything that even the noblewomen of Dargonus can acquire. Our 'princess of smugglers' would love the opportunity to rub the nobility's noses in her newfound privileges."
languages.original_text: {n}Идира расплывается в ухмылке.{/n} "Ну, это должно быть что-то, чем можно тыкать каждому встречному в нос со словами "Смотри, как Вольный Торговец любит меня". Например, роскошное платье, каких нет даже у аристократок Даргонуса. Наша "принцесса контрабандистов" будет в восторге от возможности утереть дворянству носы своими привилегиями".

Like a fabulous gown beyond anything that even the noblewomen of Dargonus can acquire. Our 'princess of smugglers' would love the opportunity to rub the nobility's noses in her newfound privileges."

languages.text: {n}El rostro de Idira se contrae en una mueca.{/n} «Bueno, tendría que ser algo que exclamase "Mirad cuánto me quiere {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente" cada vez que lo enseñe por ahí. Como un fabuloso vestido largo que ni las damas de alta alcurnia de Dargonus puedan permitirse. Nuestra "princesa contrabandista" disfrutaría mucho restregando por la cara sus nuevos privilegios a la aristocracia».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira's face breaks into a crooked smile.{/n} "Well, it would have to be something that screams 'Look how much the Rogue Trader loves me' in the faces of everyone she meets. Like a fabulous gown beyond anything that even the noblewomen of Dargonus can acquire. Our 'princess of smugglers' would love the opportunity to rub the nobility's noses in her newfound privileges."

traits.locale_text: {n}El rostro de Idira se contrae en una mueca.{/n} «Bueno, tendría que ser algo que exclamase "Mirad cuánto me quiere {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente" cada vez que lo enseñe por ahí. Como un fabuloso vestido largo que ni las damas de alta alcurnia de Dargonus puedan permitirse. Nuestra "princesa contrabandista" disfrutaría mucho restregando por la cara sus nuevos privilegios a la aristocracia».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}イディラの顔にいびつな笑みが浮かぶ。{/n}「そうね、会う人すべてに『自由開拓者はこんなにも自分を愛してるのよ！』って伝わるような何かがいいと思わ。ダルゴナスの貴婦人でさえも手に入らないような豪華なガウンとか。うちの『密輸姫』は、新たに手に入れた特権を貴族に見せびらかすのが大好きなはずだから」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira's face breaks into a crooked smile.{/n} "Well, it would have to be something that screams 'Look how much the Rogue Trader loves me' in the faces of everyone she meets. Like a fabulous gown beyond anything that even the noblewomen of Dargonus can acquire. Our 'princess of smugglers' would love the opportunity to rub the nobility's noses in her newfound privileges."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラの顔にいびつな笑みが浮かぶ。{/n}「そうね、会う人すべてに『自由開拓者はこんなにも自分を愛してるのよ！』って伝わるような何かがいいと思わ。ダルゴナスの貴婦人でさえも手に入らないような豪華なガウンとか。うちの『密輸姫』は、新たに手に入れた特権を貴族に見せびらかすのが大好きなはずだから」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉脸上突然露出了狡黠的微笑。{/n}“要我说，必须是那种非常惹眼，仿佛是在向每个人尖叫‘看看行商浪人有多爱我’的东西。比如说，连达戈努斯的贵妇都买不到的华服。我们的‘走私犯公主’肯定会兴高采烈，在那些贵族面前狠狠炫耀她的新特权。”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira's face breaks into a crooked smile.{/n} "Well, it would have to be something that screams 'Look how much the Rogue Trader loves me' in the faces of everyone she meets. Like a fabulous gown beyond anything that even the noblewomen of Dargonus can acquire. Our 'princess of smugglers' would love the opportunity to rub the nobility's noses in her newfound privileges."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉脸上突然露出了狡黠的微笑。{/n}“要我说，必须是那种非常惹眼，仿佛是在向每个人尖叫‘看看行商浪人有多爱我’的东西。比如说，连达戈努斯的贵妇都买不到的华服。我们的‘走私犯公主’肯定会兴高采烈，在那些贵族面前狠狠炫耀她的新特权。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira se fend d'un sourire en coin.{/n} « Eh bien, il faudrait que ce soit quelque chose qui proclame haut et fort votre amour pour elle à tous ceux qu'elle croisera. Comme une robe fabuleuse dépassant tout ce que même une noble de Dargonus pourrait s'offrir. Notre "princesse des contrebandiers" adorerait pouvoir en remontrer à la noblesse avec ses nouveaux privilèges. »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira's face breaks into a crooked smile.{/n} "Well, it would have to be something that screams 'Look how much the Rogue Trader loves me' in the faces of everyone she meets. Like a fabulous gown beyond anything that even the noblewomen of Dargonus can acquire. Our 'princess of smugglers' would love the opportunity to rub the nobility's noses in her newfound privileges."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira se fend d'un sourire en coin.{/n} « Eh bien, il faudrait que ce soit quelque chose qui proclame haut et fort votre amour pour elle à tous ceux qu'elle croisera. Comme une robe fabuleuse dépassant tout ce que même une noble de Dargonus pourrait s'offrir. Notre "princesse des contrebandiers" adorerait pouvoir en remontrer à la noblesse avec ses nouveaux privilèges. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ein schiefes Grinsen macht sich auf Idiras Gesicht breit.{/n} "Tja, es müsste etwas sein, was jedem, dem sie begegnet, förmlich ins Gesicht schreit: 'Seht nur, wie sehr {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} mich liebt!' Ein fabelhaftes Kleid beispielsweise, wie es nicht einmal die adligen Damen von Dargonus beschaffen können. Unsere 'Schmugglerprinzessin' würde dem Adel nur zu gerne unter die Nase reiben, welche neuen Privilegien sie genießt."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira's face breaks into a crooked smile.{/n} "Well, it would have to be something that screams 'Look how much the Rogue Trader loves me' in the faces of everyone she meets. Like a fabulous gown beyond anything that even the noblewomen of Dargonus can acquire. Our 'princess of smugglers' would love the opportunity to rub the nobility's noses in her newfound privileges."

Like a fabulous gown beyond anything that even the noblewomen of Dargonus can acquire. Our 'princess of smugglers' would love the opportunity to rub the nobility's noses in her newfound privileges."

languages.text: {n}İdira'nın yüzünde zoraki bir gülümseme beliriyor.{/n} "Şöyle ki... Karşısına çıkan herkesin suratına 'Baksana, Hür Tacir beni nasıl da seviyor.' diye haykıran bir şey olmalı. Mesela Dargonus'un soylu hanımlarının bile elde edemeyeceği, enfes bir elbise olabilir. 'Kaçakçı prensesimiz', yeni kazandığı tüm bu imtiyazları soyluların başına kakma fırsatını seve seve kullanacaktır."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira's face breaks into a crooked smile.{/n} "Well, it would have to be something that screams 'Look how much the Rogue Trader loves me' in the faces of everyone she meets. Like a fabulous gown beyond anything that even the noblewomen of Dargonus can acquire. Our 'princess of smugglers' would love the opportunity to rub the nobility's noses in her newfound privileges."

'Kaçakçı prensesimiz', yeni kazandığı tüm bu imtiyazları soyluların başına kakma fırsatını seve seve kullanacaktır."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
